name: ruffle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ T ] to touch or move something smooth so that it is not even: She affectionately ruffled his hair with her hand as she passed. The birds ruffled their feathers (up) in alarm.
[ T often passive ] to annoy or upset someone, or to make someone very nervous: He's easily ruffled by criticism.
